_header: I never saw joy like to that sight
_description: A description of his mistress — three quatrains (abab) and 4-line burden: ‘My dere an dese þat so fayr ys / Of lufe gentyl & fre / I kwn not ly, wiþowtyn lese / My lady lele best lyks me’

OxfLinLat100.First Lines:
I saw neuer ioy lyk to that sightos my fair lady
                    scheun…
OxfLinLat100.Last Lines:
…alas scho dos me tray & teenI may noght with her
                    met
